direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods estimate properties related to the Bloom filter's capacity and false positive probability, but with different inputs and outputs.
Both methods involve calculations related to the Bloom filter's capacity and false positive probability, but estimateMaxN() focuses on the maximum number of elements.
Both methods involve mathematical calculations related to the Bloom filter's parameters, such as number of items and bits.
Both methods handle the validation of probability values, ensuring they fall within acceptable ranges.
Both methods involve calculations related to the Bloom filter's bit structure and cardinality.
Both methods involve calculations related to the Bloom filter's bit structure and cardinality, though numberOfBitMaps() is more focused on the bit map structure.
